sentences.english: Xiao LAN is very surprised on this finding, she shouted niang hurriedly to the memorial tablet.
sentences.chinese: 萧岚对这一发现也非常惊讶，她连忙对着牌位大喊娘。

sentences.english: The third section is called the Memorial Hall, where the tablets for all ancestors are enshrined .
sentences.chinese: 第三进叫做“寝堂”，历代祖先的牌位在这里安寝。

sentences.english: He put the promise in the shrine beside the tablet of O-Tei.
sentences.chinese: 他将这句誓言放在神龛内阿真的牌位旁。

sentences.english: Yuan temple's main hall Yellow Emperor placed among the memorial tablets.
sentences.chinese: 轩辕庙内的大殿中间放有黄帝的牌位。

sentences.english: Let Luan school and GuanYa before the memorial tablet of LuanFu kowtow to apologize.
sentences.chinese: 让栾学堂和关雅丽在栾父的牌位前磕头认错。

sentences.english: The east and west annexes were used to hold divine tablets of various gods worshipped at the Altar to Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 这东西两边的附属建筑是过去存放各种神灵的牌位。

sentences.english: Your what person is you a moment ago said me on domestic memorial tablet?
sentences.chinese: 你刚才说我家牌位上是你什么人？

definition: to consecrate/to enshrine and worship/an offering (to one's ancestors)/a sacrifice (to a God)
to worship/to observe religious rites/to pay one's respects (to one's ancestors etc)
grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
